mil3.7.12:1.2: “Venerable Nāgasena, it is called ‘the sea, the sea’. Why is the water called the sea?”
mil3.7.12:1.4: “Just as much as there is water, your majesty, so much there is salt.
mil3.7.12:1.5: Just as much as there is salt, so much there is water.
mil3.7.12:1.6: Therefore, it is called  the sea.”
